name: DazzledApps Technologies Pvt. Ltd
description:
DazzledApps is a Mobile Game & App Development Company founded in 2014 to build interactive entertainment for the emerging smartphone market. 
 
We design & develop mobile apps & games that we believe have an immediate global appeal, recognition, and understanding. We also spend the time to understand the increasing demographic range, gender, and nationality split of the smartphone user base and makes content to resonate as wide as possible to this 
global audience.

Mobile Development
iPhone Development

Android Development

Web Development
HTML 5
UI/UX Design
Chatbot
Virtual Reality(VR)
Augmented Reality(AR)
 
Mobile Game Development Competencies

  Virtual Reality Game.

  Side Scroller 
  Infinite Runner
  Pool Games, Poker, Teen Patti, Rummy
